[b]Passware Kit Forensic[/b]
This complete evidence discovery solution reports all password-protected items on a computer 

and gains access to these items using the fastest decryption and password recovery 

algorithms. Many types of passwords are recovered or reset instantly, and advanced 

acceleration methods are used to recover difficult passwords. Passware Kit Forensic 

introduces a new attacks editor, which sets up the password recovery process in the most 

precise way to provide the quickest decryption solution possible.

Key Features

All 30+ password recovery modules and Encryption Analyzer Professional now combined in an 

all-in-one user interface
Includes Search Index Examiner to retrieve electronic evidence in a matter of minutes from a 

Windows Desktop Search Database
Includes 20 Decryptum Credits for instant online decryption of MS Word and Excel files (up 

to version 2003)
Multiple-core CPUs are now efficiently used to speed up the password recovery process 8 

different attack types (and any combination of them) could be set up using a wizard or drag 

& drop attacks editor nVidia GPU (where available) is used to accelerate MS Office 2007 

password recovery speed by 3500%
All recovered passwords are saved and ready to be reused on other files
